      • checkChoiceInput

        public int checkChoiceInput​(java.lang.String input,
                            int lowestChoice,
                            int highestChoice)
        Takes in a string of input from the user, returning the user's choice input if between given bounds, 0 otherwise
        Parameters:
        input - String input from the user to be checked for validity
        lowestChoice - lowest number option to be selected in the part of the menu
        highestChoice - highest number option to be selected in the part of the menu
        Returns:
        user's input if valid, 0 if input not within bounds or not a number

      • checkYorN

        public char checkYorN​(java.lang.String yOrN)
        Checks if input begins with a 'y' for 'Yes' or 'n' for 'No'
        Parameters:
        yOrN - user input, expected to be 'y'... or 'n'...
        Returns:
        the first letter of the input if started with 'y' or 'n', returns 1 otherwise

      • signIn

        public int signIn​(java.lang.String firstName,
                  java.lang.String ID,
                  java.lang.String pass)
        Parameters:
        firstName - Customer's first name
        ID - Customer's hotel ID
        pass - Customer's password
        Returns:
        0 if sign in is unsuccessful, 4 if successful

      • mainScreen

        public void mainScreen​()
        Displays main screen available before any signing or logging in

      • loggedIn

        public int loggedIn​(CustomerInterface c,
                    HotelInterface hotel)
        Displays options for customers to make once logged in
        Parameters:
        c - Customer, to access their first name
        hotel - Hotel, to access reservation date to match against user input
        Returns:
        4

      • checkedInMenu

        public void checkedInMenu​(CustomerInterface c,
                          Reservation res)
        Displays options for customers to make once checked in; if checking out, an option for a receipt and to take a survey is given
        Parameters:
        c - Customer, to access their name and room number
        res - Their reservation, to access their expenses to produce receipt
